properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 20 at 2:46PM PST until January 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds of 30 to 40 kt with
gusts up to 50 kt are expected tonight with seas becoming very
steep and wind driven 14 to 18 feet. Winds ease to 20 to 30 kt
on Tuesday, but seas remain very high and very steep while
transitioning to swell of 16 to 20 feet.

* Winds and seas ease a bit Tuesday night, but for the Gale Watch
on Wednesday, south gales and very steep seas could redevelop
as another front moves through.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 4 AM PST Tuesday. For the
Hazardous Seas Warning, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. For
the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday morning through Wednesday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
